meanings.definition: A king of Israel in the 10th century BC.
meanings.sent1: Jeroboam was known for his wise leadership and fair decisions.
meanings.sent2: The people of Israel looked up to Jeroboam as their king.
meanings.sent3: One day, Jeroboam the king decided to wear a silly hat to make his subjects laugh.
meanings.sent4: In the ancient tales, Jeroboam was described as a lion-hearted ruler.
meanings.sent5: The name Jeroboam echoed through the history books as a legendary king of Israel.
